0.0: [Mishnah]  THERE ARE IN THE TORAH THIRTY-SIX [TRANSGRESSIONS WHICH ARE PUNISHABLE WITH] EXTINCTION:
0.1: WHEN ONE HAS INTERCOURSE WITH HIS MOTHER, HIS FATHER'S WIFE OR HIS DAUGHTER-IN-LAW;
0.2: WHEN A MAN HAS CONNECTION WITH A MALE, OR COVERS A BEAST, OR WHEN A WOMAN ALLOWS HERSELF TO BE COVERED BY A BEAST;
0.3: WHEN ONE HAS INTERCOURSE WITH A WOMAN AND HER DAUGHTER, WITH A MARRIED WOMAN,
0.4: WITH HIS SISTER, WITH HIS FATHER'S SISTER, HIS MOTHER'S SISTER, HIS WIFE'S SISTER, HIS BROTHER'S WIFE, THE WIFE OF HIS FATHER'S BROTHER, OR WITH A MENSTRUOUS WOMAN;
0.5: WHEN ONE BLASPHEMES [THE LORD]. SERVES IDOLS, DEDICATES OF HIS CHILDREN TO MOLECH OR HAS A FAMILIAR SPIRIT, OR DESECRATES THE SABBATH;.
0.6: WHEN AN UNCLEAN PERSON EATS OF SACRIFICIAL FOOD, OR WHEN ONE ENTERS THE PRECINCTS OF THE TEMPLE IN AN UNCLEAN STATE;
0.7: WHEN ONE EATS HELEB, BLOOD, NOTHAR OR PIGGUL;
0.8: WHEN ONE SLAUGHTERS OR OFFERS UP [A CONSECRATED ANIMAL] OUTSIDE [THE TEMPLE PRECINCTS];
0.9: WHEN ONE EATS ANYTHING LEAVENED ON PASSOVER; WHEN ONE EATS OR WORKS ON THE DAY OF ATONEMENT;
0.10: WHEN ONE COMPOUNDS OIL [OF ANOINTING] OR COMPOUNDS INCENSE, OR USES [UNLAWFULLY] OIL OF ANOINTING;
0.11: AND [WHEN ONE TRANSGRESSES THE LAWS OF] THE PASCHAL OFFERING , AND CIRCUMCISION — FROM AMONG POSITIVE COMMANDMENTS.
0.12: FOR THESE [TRANSGRESSIONS] ONE IS LIABLE TO EXTINCTION IF COMMITTED WILFULLY,27 AND IF IN ERROR TO A SIN-OFFERING, AND IF THERE IS A DOUBT WHETHER HE HAD COMMITTED THE TRANSGRESSION TO A SUSPENSIVE GUILT-OFFERING,
0.13: EXCEPT IN THE CASE OF ONE WHO DEFILED THE TEMPLE OR ITS CONSECRATED THINGS, SINCE ONE IS LIABLE IN THIS CASE TO A SLIDING-SCALE SACRIFICE. THUS R. MEIR,
0.15: ALSO THE BLASPHEMER [IS AN EXCEPTION], FOR IT SAYS:
0.16: YE SHALL HAVE ONE LAW FOR HIM THAT DOETH AUGHT IN ERROR;(Numbers 15:29) THIS IS TO EXCLUDE THE BLASPHEMER WHO PERFORMS NO ACTION.

1.1: "That person that wants to know whether [his life] will extend through the year or not, should bring a candle during the ten days between Rosh Hashanah and Yom Kippur and suspend it in a room where the wind is not blowing. If its light (its flame) continues, he will know that he will take out the year.
1.2: And a person that wants to conduct a business deal and wants to  know if the deal will be a successful one or not, should feed a chicken. If it becomes fat and beautiful, he will know that it will be successful.
1.3: That person that wants to go on a journey and wants to know if he will return to his home, should go out and stand in a partially darkened room. If he sees

2.0: a shadow in the shadow of his shadow, he will know that he will return to his home."
2.1: And this is not a [correct] matter, lest his spirit become weak [as a result] and his [fortune guided by his] constellation will become bad.
2.3: "Now that you have said that a sign is a [correct] matter, a man should accustom himself to eating squash, beans, leeks, beets and dates on Rosh Hashanah."
